医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
表观基因组动力学塑造人类大脑发育和神经精神疾病风险研究人员研究了前额皮质和海马体发育过程中的染色质构象和表观基因组重组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Epigenomic-dynamics-shape- human-brain-development-and-neuropsychiatric-disorder-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Epigenomic-dynamics-shape- human-brain-development-and-neuropsychiatric-disorder-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54dfbf42-cbf5-46a0-a39e-a36e2104adba Mon, 14 Oct 2024 10:11:00 -0400 Epigenomic dynamics shape human brain development and neuropsychiatric disorder risks
新的临床模型可以准确预测老年人髋部骨折风险乌普萨拉大学的研究人员开发了一种临床模型，可以准确预测老年人髋部骨折的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-clinical-model-can-accurately-predict-hip-fracture-risk-in-the-elderly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-clinical-model-can-accurately-predict-hip-fracture-risk-in-the-elderly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10e2f328-3677-4a67-80dd-1bad3adf353f Mon, 14 Oct 2024 10:01:00 -0400 New clinical model can accurately predict hip fracture risk in the elderly
USP50 蛋白的发现揭示了 DNA 复制过程一项新的研究发现了一种蛋白质，它参与确定复制过程中哪些酶切割或解旋 DNA。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Discovery-of-USP50- Protein-sheds-light-on-DNA-replication-processes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Discovery-of-USP50- Protein-sheds-light-on-DNA-replication-processes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9998bfed-5145-44cc-b407-8789ac841f76 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 09:35:58 -0400 Discovery of USP50 protein sheds light on DNA replication processes
亚历山德拉·诺尔 (Alexandra Knauer) 荣获“2024 年度柏林家族企业家”奖10 月 8 日，在柏林 Soho House 举行的节日晚间活动中，总部位于柏林的高科技实验室仪器制造商 KNAUER 的负责人荣获“Die Familienunternehmer”（家族企业家）协会颁发的荣誉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Alexandra-Knauer-receives-e2809cBerlin-family-entrepreneur-of-the-year-2024e2809d-award.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Alexandra-Knauer-receives-e2809cBerlin-family-entrepreneur-of-the-year-2024e2809d-award.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f75f7026-0163-4e26-b968-d86e96f45e99 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 06:03:00 -0400 Alexandra Knauer receives “Berlin family entrepreneur of the year 2024” award
从头抗体蛋白测序揭示了 SARS-CoV-2 疫苗接种后的新型功能性和中和抗体Rapid Novor 发表了一项研究，强调了将从头抗体蛋白测序与传统蛋白质组学相结合，以发现 SARS-CoV-2 疫苗接种后人血浆中的功能性和中和性抗体的力量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/De-novo-antibody- Protein-sequencing-reveals-novel-function-and-neutralizing-antibodies-Post-SARS-CoV-2-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/De-novo-antibody- Protein-sequencing-reveals-novel-function-and-neutralizing-antibodies-Post-SARS-CoV-2-vaccination.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=551cdcda-461a-4813-8c27-1187e3fe08dd Mon, 14 Oct 2024 05:44:00 -0400 De novo antibody protein sequencing reveals novel functional and neutralizing antibodies post-SARS-CoV-2 vaccination
Calluna Pharma 任命 Mark Gaffney 为首席执行官，Mark Altmeyer 为董事会独立主席Calluna Pharma AS (Calluna) 是一家临床阶段生物技术公司，致力于开发治​​疗炎症和纤维化疾病的一流抗体，今天宣布任命 Mark Gaffney 为首席执行官，任命 Mark Altmeyer 为董事会主席。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Calluna-Pharma-appoints-Mark-Gaffney-as-Chief-Executive-Officer-and-Mark-Altmeyer-as-Independent-Chair-of-the-板.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Calluna-Pharma-appoints-Mark-Gaffney-as-Chief-Executive-Officer-and-Mark-Altmeyer-as-Independent-Chair-of-the- Board.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c31996bf-f44e-42a8-a454-37dd8a4e5b17 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 05:42:00 -0400 Calluna Pharma appoints Mark Gaffney as Chief Executive Officer and Mark Altmeyer as Independent Chair of the Board
Clec14a 蛋白被发现在调节骨形成和密度中发挥重要作用含有 H 型内皮蛋白 14A (Clec14a) 的 C 型凝集素结构域在协调成骨细胞活性中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Clec14a- Protein-found-to-play-vital-role-in-regulate-bone-formation-and- Density.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Clec14a- Protein-found-to-play-vital-role-in-regulate-bone-formation-and- Density.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8715c975-f757-435e-8249-b5ee83fc5788 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 05:17:00 -0400 Clec14a protein found to play vital role in regulating bone formation and density
怀孕期间喝咖啡真的会影响孩子的神经发育吗？新研究表明可能不会母亲在怀孕期间饮用咖啡是否会对胎儿的神经发育产生影响，并可能与后代的神经发育困难有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Does-drinking-coffee-during-pregnancy-really-affect-a-childe28099s-neurodevelopment-New-study-says-likely-not.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Does-drinking-coffee-during-pregnancy-really-affect-a-childe28099s-neurodevelopment-New-study-says-likely-not.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7d9fe83-f23a-4cf6-acb3-09693d864490 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 04:40:00 -0400 Does drinking coffee during pregnancy really affect a child’s neurodevelopment? New study says likely not
新纳米粒子系统对抗肥胖研究人员推出了一种通过靶向小肠脂肪吸收来解决肥胖问题的新方法。这种尖端的纳米颗粒系统旨在将治疗分子直接输送到消化道，已显示出预防饮食引起的肥胖的巨大潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-nanoarticle-system-fights-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-nanoarticle-system-fights-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2ea1781-21ac-4b16-bf32-74a9df982a9d Mon, 14 Oct 2024 01:00:32 -0400 New nanoparticle system fights obesity
2 型糖尿病有前景的新治疗策略今天在 UEG Week 2024 上发表的突破性研究揭示了一种有前景的 2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 新治疗策略，可以显着减少甚至消除对胰岛素治疗的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Promising-new-treatment-strategy-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Promising-new-treatment-strategy-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccd4bdfd-3fdc-40c1-a7b0-716f87a55a94 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 00:37:56 -0400 Promising new treatment strategy for type 2 diabetes
